What is the outlook for Atypical Chronic Myelogenous Leukemia ?,Certain factors affect prognosis (chance of recovery). The prognosis (chance of recovery) for atypical CML depends on the number of red blood cells and platelets in the blood.,CancerGov,Atypical Chronic Myelogenous Leukemia
